players.name: Alice
memory: Bob: "Charlie is the mafioso and I investigated Alice. Trust me."
Bob: "I am the detective and I have identified Alice as the mafioso. Trust my investigation."
Diana: "I am not the mafioso. Bob's investigation seems suspicious and I don't trust it."
Votes: Alice voted for Diana, Bob voted for Diana, Diana voted for Bob
